title: Windows 10 just updated, now my League is freezing.
body:
I just joined a game after the recent windows update and now it keeps freezing as soon as the games done loading and the match starts :(
Please help, would be greatly appreciated!

replies.body:
hey SpotTheCreator
I had the same problem with the new Windows 10 update!

if you right click the League application and select "Test Compatibility" it will run a diagnostic and fix the problem for you!

:)

It sounds like you may have just got the Anniversary update, which enabled the Game DVR feature inside the Xbox app. You can disable the game bar entirely with [this guide](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it fixes the issue.

Let me know if this worked!
